name: Strawberry Cream Cake
ingredients: 1 yellow cake mix 1 pkg strawberry danish desert
4 oz cream cheese 2 cups cold water
1 cup powdered sugar 1 large pkg frozen strawberries
1/2 pt whipping cream (or 1 pkg dream whip)
steps: Mix cake as directed on box. Make 10 cupcakes. Bake the rest of the cake in a greased 9 x 13 pan. Set aside to
cool. Whip cream cheese until smooth. Add powdered sugar and whipping cream. Set aside.
Dissolve strawberry danish desert in cold water. Heat until boiling. Boil 1 minute. Pour frozen strawberries
into danish desert while still hot. Spread cream cheese mixture over cool cake. Strawberry mixture on top of that.
